A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Possibly the best of the franchise but absolutely the best since Empire. Where The Force Awakens succeeded by playing to the familiar Star Wars formula\, The Last Jedi does so by standing on it's own 2 feet. It's thoroughly self aware\, leading the audience down familiar alleyways but ultimately subverting the plot just when you think it's going to be Empire Part 2. TLJ is darker\, wittier and without doubt the most original piece of Star Wars property in decades.
